assets.changelog:
###    🚀 新功能

- 投影原理图管理相关优化，解决加载过慢的问题  -  by @caomei269 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1000 [<samp>(fcf49)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/fcf49a4e)
- 支持锁定窗口大小  -  by @CiiLu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1014 [<samp>(7523b)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/7523bf70)
- **JLW**:
  - 不默认启用  -  by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1013 [<samp>(1a588)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/1a58876e)
- **NetCache**:
  - 网络缓存  -  by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1015 [<samp>(a500f)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/a500fa32)
- **SnapLite**:
  - 部分内容改为仅修改而不是重新写入  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(e063c)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/e063c59b)
- **UI**:
  - 改回部分 UI  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(20a56)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/20a5602f)
- **launch**:
  - 支持分析 mod loader 版本问题导致的崩溃并提示用户修改版本  -  by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1012 [<samp>(22e7a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/22e7a258)
- **promote**:
  - 支持运行时提权操作  -  by @ruattd [<samp>(6b44b)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/6b44b7ed)
  - 添加预定义函数支持  -  by @ruattd [<samp>(50c5f)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/50c5f98e)

###    🐛 修复

- MMC 整合包 Libraries 应用可能出错  -  by @Pigeon0v0 [<samp>(d4f94)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d4f94796)

- **NetCache**:
  - 错误的索引查找  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(16026)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/16026228)
  - 错误的索引  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(1d292)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/1d2926a0)
  - 一些使用问题  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(e4c75)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/e4c75e77)

###    🚀 新功能

- 添加投影原理图支持并优化组件管理功能  -  by @caomei269 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/959 [<samp>(ca5b8)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/ca5b8030)
- 原理图管理支持显示子文件夹  -  by @caomei269 and @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/971 [<samp>(11dc9)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/11dc9400)
- 投影文件管理优化  -  by @caomei269 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/979 [<samp>(5b27d)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/5b27d0e4)
- 投影原理图管理子文件夹的相关优化  -  by @caomei269 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/991 [<samp>(b6541)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/b65412b3)
- **ID**:
  - 修改识别码算法  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(8aad1)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/8aad1362)
- **Init**:
  - 删除旧的日志文件  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(6b95e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/6b95e953)
- **LocalModItem**:
  - 在 Mod 列表中显示模组自带的方形图标  -  by @youzi-3222 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/885 [<samp>(917d6)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/917d6023)
- **Markdown**:
  - 初步实现 Markdown  -  by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/982 [<samp>(cbb9f)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/cbb9f25a)
  - 更多窗口支持展示 Markdown  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(17787)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/17787da0)
- **Profile**:
  - 尝试性提醒用户创建档案啥的  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(704fb)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/704fbcbe)
  - 允许显示披风预览  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(7102e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/7102e96b)
- **Saves**:
  - 展示"是否允许作弊"和"游戏时长"  -  by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/973 [<samp>(fcb44)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/fcb44cad)
- **SavesInfo**:
  - 支持简单查看存档信息  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(96d0b)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/96d0b434)
- **SnapLite**:
  - 支持存档备份  -  by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/945 [<samp>(613e2)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/613e2f88)
  - 允许清理无用文件  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(4105f)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/4105f4d0)
- **Update**:
  - 支持增量更新  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(25919)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/259194be)
  - 应用更新之前校验 SHA256  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(f2c03)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/f2c03893)
- **World**:
  - 存档版本识别功能  -  by @youzi-3222 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/929 [<samp>(3a1c4)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/3a1c49f2)
- **lifecycle**:
  - 适配生命周期管理  -  by @ruattd [<samp>(86aaf)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/86aaf54e)
- **log**:
  - 细化日志输出  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(d5d86)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d5d8678d)
- **modpack**:
  - MMC JSON-Patches 支持  -  by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/841 [<samp>(71066)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/7106667f)
- **profile**:
  - 自适应档案选择视图大小  -  by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/947 [<samp>(dd786)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/dd786180)
- **tools**:
  - 瞅眼服务器支持展示默认图标  -  by @MoYuan-CN [<samp>(60b87)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/60b87072)

###    🐛 修复

- 反复切换页面后 issue 列表出现重复项目  -  by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/915 [<samp>(bb6fe)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/bb6fe94b)
- 初始化第一阶段日志丢失  -  by @ruattd [<samp>(2c17f)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/2c17f9c0)
- **Comp**:
  - 原理图在进入新文件夹后切换版本查看原理图会发生展示内容错误  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(2de0b)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/2de0bf3b)

  - Oracle 可能被判断为 OpenJDK  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(dd0be)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/dd0be350)

  - 尽可能区分 OpenJDK 与 OracleJDK  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(85eb3)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/85eb33fb)
  - Java 初始化异步进行以防止线程堵塞  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(a1600)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/a1600aa8)
- **ModLaunch**:
  - 修复检查存档快捷启动失败的问题  -  by @youzi-3222 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/975 [<samp>(fea0e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/fea0e090)

- **Profile**:

  - 皮肤修改出错的问题  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(aafc3)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/aafc3f3e)
- **Saves**:
  - 左侧栏选中项目不正确  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(15aec)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/15aec73d)
- **SavesInfo**:
  - 1.8以下的版本没有difficulty导致报错  -  by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/977 [<samp>(385c2)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/385c2ac4)
- **SnapLite**:

你也可以直接在下方的 Assets 中下载
